title: Christmas Spectacular Font
content:
Hello all,

I am trying to find out which font this is (the one that says "Christmas Spectacular"). Also suggestions for similar fonts are welcome.

Thanks!

Peter

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [christmas\_spectacular.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013214932/http:/typophile.com/files/christmas_spectacular.png) | 48.5 KB |
author: flitsor

comments.content:
maybe a better sample will get this one rolling...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013214932im_/http:/typophile.com/files/00000000000000028805-900x900_300dpi_RGB_6607.jpg)

Thanks for the better sample :)  
It's a long shot, but it could be a custom job based on **[ITC Garamond Ultra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013214932/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=ITC%20Garamond%20LT%20Ultra%20Condensed%20-%20Regular&fid=bec47766b6178be5514fb83684c20cdf&fsize=60&text=CHRISTMAS%20SPECTACULAR&wrap=2)**
Too long. That would be too much work, IMO.

You should see how long it took to make ITC Garamond!  
There _are_ people who put a lot of effort into making things.

hhp
